```{r pkgs}
pkgs <- c('gt', 'glue', 'dplyr', 'stringr')
xfun::pkg_attach2(pkgs, message = F)
```

```{r paths}
in_paths <- list()
in_paths['books'] <- 'data/books.csv'
```

```{r data}
ds <- list()
ds$books <- read.csv(in_paths$books)
```

```{r}
ds$books <- ds$books |>
  mutate(date = glue("{year}-{str_pad(month, 2, 'left', 0)}"),
         description_md = glue("**{title}** ({year})<br>By {authors}<br>{description}<br>[<a href='{link}'>url</a>] [<a href='{github_link}' target='_blank'>github</a>]"))
```

```{r}
#| results: asis
for (i in 1:nrow(ds$books)) {
  cat('\n', ds$books$description_md[i], '\n')
}
```
